portfolio.title: To-Do List Application
portfolio.description:
I have used React to build a todo app that saves and loads to local storage. The React project will include full CRUD functionality: create, read, update, and delete; plus a customizable theme switcher so users can:
- switch between light/dark mode
- pick their preferred colors for the app

portfolio.title: Blog Platform
portfolio.description: I have implemented a blog platform from scratch using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). Developed user authentication and authorization functionalities, allowing users to create, edit, and delete blog posts securely.

portfolio.title: Flashcard Quiz Application
portfolio.description: Created an interactive online flashcard quiz application, with multiple question categories, using React while connecting to an external API.
